{"step_by_step_thinking": "The central value of a set of values is also known as the median. The median is the value separating the higher half from the lower half of a data sample. In terms of quartiles, percentiles, and deciles, the median is the 2nd quartile, the 50th percentile, and the 5th decile. Therefore, the 2nd quartile would be the central value of a set of 180 values.", "answer_choice": "C. 2nd quartile"}
